title: i want to report a player for making me want to commit suicide.
body:
i was playing a game of nasus, and i was against a vlad. As u know vlad's poke just pisses u off
our whole team was feeding and this player called "A dark horse" kept telling me to kill myself and he was telling me things that werent nice. and he made me feel suicidal. I hope riot sees this and deals with this player thank you

replies.body:
[Read this.](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules) Name-and-shame isn't encouraged here. You can report players by using the tools inside of the client at the end of the game. If you couldn't do that for some reason, [submit a support ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) about it.

As for the future, you may want to mute all other players when you enter a game. The OCE community is pretty bad, and relying just on pings for team-oriented communication works for the most part.

That would be relevant if reporting players was a viable option.

My cousin has around 5000+ reported+muted people in his list.

He constantly has them on his team whenever he plays.

That's queer. Not because of the fact that he's being matched with people he's reported, but because he's being matched **with the same people at all**. Unless he is of extremely high/low MMR, that should never happen.

There is no system implemented to restrict the match-making in terms of whom has reported whom because of this.

Yeah he does that, 

I think he has body image issues..
